oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Mrs. T. S. Brown to Mayor Crump
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Brown, Mrs. T. S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Embracing Citizenship
Voting Rights
African American women; Correspondence
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Handwritten on letterhead of City Federation of Colored Women's Clubs, Memphis, Tennessee, Sept. 1, 1927.

This letter from Mrs. T.S. Brown to Mayor E.H. Crump, endorsing the Democratic ticket, which includes the statement "I know you are a friend to my race, and to me personally," closes with an expression of solidarity: "yours for a better Memphis."
